1369440.name: Star Souls Wallpapers
1369440.description:
Amazing views of deep space, destroyed planets, nebulae and asteroid fields! Enjoy atmospheric art created by artist Dmitriy Leonovich for Star Souls game.

Free additional content for Star Souls includes 42 space illustrations.

Each image is 4800x3072 pixels.

After downloading this add-on will be available in the directory where the game Star Souls is installed, by default it is (...\Steam\steamapps\common\Star Souls\StarSouls_Wallpapers).
1369440.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
